Save the Refugees

Save the Refugees is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Save the Refugees can be acquired during Chapter One of the first Act. Completing Save the Refugees will progress the story forward.

Baldur's Gate 3 Save the Refugees Objectives

Help the Emerald Grove.

Rath believes that Halsin is the only one able to persuade Kagha to stop the ritual - and save the tieflings.
